itemDescription: British politician and leading member of the Conservative Party (1831-1890)

wikipedia_page.main: Henry Howard Molyneux Herbert, 4th Earl of Carnarvon,  (24 June 1831 – 29 June 1890), known as Lord Porchester from 1833 to 1849, was a British politician and a leading member of the Conservative Party. He was twice Secretary of State for the Colonies and also served as Lord Lieutenant of Ireland.
